suite.name: ServeRest

test.name: Testar a API pública de estudos serverest

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=API_serverest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Name
kw.doc: :example 'John Doe'

kw.name: Password
kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '115'} body=b'{"nome": "Erick Rocha", "email": "rodriguesmariane@example.com", "password": "4SRQa1Fi_@", "administrador": "true"}'

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '67'} body=b'{"email": "rodriguesmariane@example.com", "password": "4SRQa1Fi_@"}'

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Item
kw.doc: An item of ``key`` / ``value`` must be found in a ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
